params.applicationMetadata: string of constant metadata for the defailts of the account
params.updatableMetadata: string of constant metadata for the defailts of the account

created(address).details: Returns whether the account has created or not.

params.proxy: address of the proxy contract that represents an account.

ownerOf(address).details: Returns the owner of the account.

params.proxy: address of the proxy contract that represents an account.

updateApplicationMetadata(address,string.details: Updates media account. It can only be called by the deployer as it is an application info.

updateMedia(address,string).details: Updates media account. It can be called by media proxies.

params.proxy: address of the proxy contract address

devdoc.title: MediaRegistry - registers a list of media accounts.
